biography: Eero is a highly accomplished golfer who hails from Vuosaari Golf Helsinki.  He has consistently demonstrated skill and determination throughout his career, making appearances at the prestigious Hector Trophée since 2022.

Eero's dedication to the game is evident in his multiple appearances at the Hector Trophée, participating in the 2022, 2023, 2024, and 2025 tournaments. While he's yet to claim the coveted Hector Trophée itself, a testament to the fierce competition, he has achieved significant individual success.

His impressive performance in the Hector Trophée VI tournament culminated in a victory, earning him the prestigious Victor trophy. This win showcased Eero's exceptional talent and ability to perform under pressure, solidifying his place among the elite golfers participating in this challenging event.
